name: Lucid Life
description:
Lucid Life is a contemporary piece set around the idea of a digital afterlife. You, a selected postmortem candidate, must make the choice to either be within the Lucid Life™ network or to disband your new digital form and continue down the tradition path of afterlife.

A Mac version will be available in a couple days.

It's a short project and only takes at most 10 minutes to play through. Yet it's my strongest piece yet!

As always if you see a bug or issues don't be afraid to message me. I'm fully willing to hear critique on this as well.
